body.name: Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol.1 (NSW)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 12 mins
features: This innovative game series was born from the idea of avoiding combat and infiltrating enemy territory undetected
Title line up: Metal Gear, Metal Gear 2, Metal Gear Solid, Metal Gear Solid 2, Metal Gear Solid 3, Metal Gear (NES/FC version), and Snake’s Revenge
Digital books: Metal Gear Solid, Metal Gear Solid 2, Metal Gear Solid 3, Metal Gear, and Metal Gear; Screenplay and Master Books included
Video: Metal Gear Solid; Digital Graphic Novel and Metal Gear Solid 2; Digital Graphic Novel
Includes Metal Gear Solid: Digital Soundtrack

The cartridge or digital install size for the Nintendo Switch is reflective of the included bonus content. Players can choose which title they wish to install first once they have downloaded it onto their gaming platforms.
body.description: METAL GEAR SOLID: MASTER COLLECTION Vol. 1 contains “Metal Gear Solid,” “Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty,” “Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater” and much more bonus content. Bonus content includes the first title in the METAL GEAR series, a Screenplay Book containing in-game text of each title and a Master Book detailing the story and characters. Also included in the bonus content of the METAL GEAR SOLID: MASTER COLLECTION Vol. 1 will be two digital graphic novels. The Metal Gear Solid: Digital Graphic Novel is a fully voiced, digital comic depicting the events of Metal Gear Solid through beautifully dynamic animated panels, followed by Metal Gear Solid 2: Digital Graphic Novel that expands on the events of the sequel. **The cartridge or digital install size for the Nintendo Switch™ is reflective of the included bonus content. Players can choose which title they wish to install first once they have downloaded it onto their gaming platforms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Metal Gear Solid is that one game from my youth that really got me into video games. Aside from those repetitive (but fun) side scroller type games. MGS really brought story telling alive in a game. It’s worth having all three of these titles remastered and rereleased BUT at least for the switch BEWARE that buying the digital version might be better if not the same as the physical edition. All 3 games HAVE to be downloaded! Which is to me is stupid because what is the point of having the cartridge? Once placed in the system you need to download all three games (and bonus crap) but then you still need the cartridge to play them! It just seems unnecessary and annoying for taking up so much space! Don’t get me wrong it’s worth having MGS and MGS3 back to play at my leisure. The memory thing is just something I wish I was made aware of before buying the physical version. like I started though, MGS is that game that got me into gaming. That alone is worth having it for. Plus you get three games which is hours/days/weeks of nostalgic fun. Makes me optimistic that one day MGS4 will be rereleased! That game only came out on ps3 like 15 years or more ago and has never been remastered or available on any of the next gen consoles. Maybe Hideo Kojima can influence that game to come out! 🤞🏻

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The games are good, but this physical edition doesn’t have a single game on the cartridge. It forces you to download each game and you’re unable to play the games fully without these downloads. (32 gb total according to back of box (pic included)).That coupled with Konami doing the bare minimum to get these games ported gets this a 1 star on the physical edition.Wait until it’s on sale digitally, or if it drops down to super cheap for a physical then feel free to grab it.Otherwise, if you own these games in any other form don’t bother with this one. The remasters don’t make the games look any better than they did on original release, so this whole collection is a wasted opportunity turned soulless cash-grab.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Finally MGS 1-3 on Nintendo!!
reviews.reviewText: This is an amazing collection of some of the most influential games of our lifetime. I wish they had done a little more rather than just a 1:1 port for each title but I’ll take what I can get. Never before has MGS (The first game) been on consoles (other than PS) not to mention the fact that it’s portable on the Nintendo Switch. This is a great 5 game collection, however, there are a couple of caveats: 1. There is a MASSIVE download required for the physical version (almost 23GB) 2. The framerate targets 30fps, but doesn’t always reach that mark. 3. This collection is on updated hardware but there is little on offer as far as upscaling resolution, and increased framerates (at least on the Switch version.) As a package, that includes tons of bonus, content, like graphic novels, lore literature, and PDF versions of the original game manuals, 5 complete games and even a couple of bonus modes for MGS1, it’s a must buy for physical collectors, MGS fans, and newcomers alike. If you’re a stickler for better graphics and increased framerates you may want to get it for one of the current gen consoles instead, but as a massive collector of physical Switch games I love this collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen producto en relación precio - calidad.
reviews.reviewText: Buen juego y a un excelente precio
C'est bon de retrouver des classiques comme ceux-ci. Je suis très contente.
Received exactly what I ordered 👌 and received it earlier then expected.

No me mal interpreten con el titulo de la reseña, los 5 juegos son joyas, pero no les dieron ni una manita de gato, están tal cual salieron en su día.Para mi el punto a rescatar es el remapeo de los controles, así medio los puedes modernizar, aunque si los jugaste en su momento, solo es cuestión de recordar los controlesEl apartado visual no esta mal, pero pudo ser mejorLa banda sonora se mantiene y para mi sigue siendo clásica y memorableEl precio esta algo caro, recomiendo que lo compren en descuento, cuando este por debajo de los $900MXNEn general esta bien si tomas en cuenta que estas comprando juegos viejitos pero bonitosLo recomiendo si eres fan de la sagaSolo habrá que ver que dice Konami cuando muera la eShop de la Switch, porque si no los descargas antes del cierre, tendrás un bonito pisapapeles con la portada de Metal Gear Solid

If you are not ready for Tactical Espionage Action, then you should not purchase this collection of games. If you happen to be a little sneaky sneakster, then this is the collection for you! Sneak around, find out stuff, kill some dudes or dudettes. Classic games. Why anyone would need a review for them now, idk. ENJOY!
